tasks.label: Restart backend (8787)
tasks.command: $listenPid=(Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 8787 -State Listen -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty OwningProcess); if ($listenPid) { Stop-Process -Id $listenPid -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 300 }; Set-Location 'C:\Users\Louis\Visual Studio\smart-assistant Backend'; node backend\dist\local-api.js
